definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[בַּז]] Zec 4:10 (cf. Kö:i. 439); 3 pl. [[בָָּזוּ]] Pr 1:7; Impf. [[יׇבוּז]] Pr 23:9; 3 fs. [[וְתָבֻז]] Pr 30:17; 2 ms. [[תָּבוּז]] (Juss.) Pr 23:22; pl. [[יׇבוּזוּ]] Pr 6:30, Ct So 8:7; [[יׇבֻזוּ]] Ct So 8:1; Inf. abs. [[בּוֹז]] Ct So 8:7; Pt. Pr 11:12 + 2 t.;—despise, shew despite toward (WisdLt & poet.) c. acc. Pr 1:7; c. Inf. + [[ל]] Pr 30:17; elsewh. sq. [[ל]] + noun, Pr 6:30, Pr 11:12, Pr 13:13, Pr 14:21, Pr 23:9, Pr 23:22, Ct So 8:1, So 8:7, So 8:7, Zec 4:10.
